pageContext.claim: “I don't think [Kellyanne Conway] said [riots and chaos and violence help Trump's cause].”
pageContext.analysis: Amid the protests in Kenosha, Wis., appearing on “Fox & Friends” in late August, Conway said, “The more chaos and anarchy and vandalism and violence reigns, the better it is for the very clear choice on who’s best on public safety and law and order.”
